scripts.dev: pnpm build:shared && pnpm db:generate && pnpm dev:all
scripts.dev:all: pnpm --filter @autolink/shared dev & pnpm --filter @autolink/server dev & pnpm --filter @autolink/web dev & pnpm --filter @autolink/app dev & wait
scripts.dev:server: pnpm build:shared && pnpm db:generate && pnpm --filter @autolink/server dev
scripts.build: pnpm build:shared && pnpm db:generate && pnpm build:consumers
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --filter @autolink/server exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm db:generate
scripts.db:push: pnpm --filter @autolink/server exec prisma db push && pnpm db:generate
scripts.erd:build: sed 's/provider = "postgresql"/provider = "postgresql"\n  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")/' ./packages/server/prisma/schema.prisma > /tmp/autolink-erd-schema.prisma && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://x@localhost/x npx @liam-hq/cli erd build --input /tmp/autolink-erd-schema.prisma --format prisma
